类的使用
representation.Node

使用Node的程序包
程序包
说明
representation
 
Save
 

  • representation中Node的使用

    representation中Node的子类
    修饰符和类型
    类
    说明
    class 
    BattleNode
    Represents a battle scenario node where the player character engages in combat with an enemy.
    class 
    ChanceNode
    Represents a node in the game's narrative structure where the next path is determined randomly.
    class 
    DecisionNode
    Represents a node in the game's narrative structure where the player must make a decision.
    class 
    ImageNode
    A decorator class that adds an image feature to nodes.
    class 
    InnerNode
    Represents an inner node within the game's narrative structure.
    class 
    NodeDecorator
    Represents a decorator for nodes in the game, providing additional functionality or information while maintaining the same interface as a standard node.
    class 
    SoundNode
    A decorator class that adds sound playback capabilities to nodes.
    class 
    TerminalNode
    Represents a terminal node in the game's story, indicating an endpoint of a particular path or story arc.
    返回Node的representation中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    Node
    BattleNode.chooseNext()
    Engages the player in a turn-based battle with the enemy.
    Node
    ChanceNode.chooseNext()
    Randomly chooses the next node from the available options.
    Node
    DecisionNode.chooseNext()
    Asks the player to make a decision and chooses the next node based on the player's input.
    Node
    Event.chooseNext()
    Chooses the next node based on the current event's logic.
    Node
    InnerNode.chooseNext()
    Chooses and returns the next node to proceed to based on the current node's logic.
    abstract Node
    Node.chooseNext()
    Determines and returns the next node based on the current node's logic.
    Node
    NodeDecorator.chooseNext()
    Delegates the choice of the next node to the wrapped node's logic.
    Node
    SoundNode.chooseNext()
    Override chooseNext methods
    Node
    TerminalNode.chooseNext()
    Since this is a terminal node, it does not lead to any next node.
    Node
    InnerNode.getNextNode(int i)
    Retrieves a specific next node given an index.
    Node
    NodeDecorator.getWrappedNode()
    Returns the wrapped node.
    返回变量类型为Node的类型的representation中的方法

    方法
    说明
    List<Node>
    InnerNode.getNextNodes()
    Retrieves all the next possible nodes as an unmodifiable list.

    方法
    说明

    InnerNode.addNextNode(Node node)
    Dynamically adds a node to the list of next possible nodes.

    方法
    说明

    InnerNode.setNextNodes(List<Node> newNextNodes)
    Replaces the current list of next nodes with a new list provided.

    限定符
    构造器

    ImageNode(Node wrappedNode, String imagePath, GameFrame gameFrame)
